::Rodimus Prime::

Rodimus continued to hug his wife and waited for a response from the command center about what was going on.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:                                  Nighlight:
 
 the femme didnt said nothing and hug him thightly
 --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
 >
 > ::Rodimus Prime::
 > 
 > Rodimus embraces his wife, holding her close and tight.
 > 
 > Rodimus: I'll come back from this. I promise you. The Matrix 
 picked me to be it's champion. To fight evil like this. It's my 
 destiny to face tyrants like this Decepticon; but when the day is 
 done I'll still be coming home to my family.
 > 
 > xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> 
 wrote:                                  Nightlight 
 >  
 >  "Promise me that you will come back, that nothing will happen 
 you... I 
 >  couldnt live without you..." said Nightlightwhile she huged him
 >  
 >  --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@> wrote:
 >  >
 >  > ::Rodimus Prime::
 >  > 
 >  > Rodimus: I'm hoping he doesn't have one. He's probably 
 independent

 then 
 >  I believe I'll have a chance.
